Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

In a large skillet over medium heat, brown the beef. Drain excess fat. Mix with taco seasoning and refried beans. Spread half of the mixture in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Layer with two tortillas, trimming as needed, and half of the cheese. Repeat the layers.
Bake for 35 to 45 minutes until thoroughly heated and cheese is bubbling. Garnish with green onions and tomatoes. Allow to cool for 5 minutes before serving.
